mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_phone, u.user_img,u.user_area, u.token, u.role_id,u.my_team_id,u.team_department_id,td.department_type FROM user u LEFT JOIN team_department td ON td.team_department_id = u.team_department_id WHERE u.user_phone = #{userPhone} AND u.user_password = #{userPassword} AND u.my_team_id IN (SELECT my_team_id t FROM my_team t WHERE t.my_team_pid = #{myTeamId} OR t.my_team_id = #{myTeamId})
